message: I have a unique opportunity to sell you a valuable product. I'm open to negotiations, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for it. I'm starting with an initial offer of $1100000.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $800000. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.

I understand you're working with a tight budget, Bob. However, I've invested significant resources in this product, and I need to ensure I get a fair return. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be at least at $950000 to make it worth my while.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $925000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise, considering the value I'll get from the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm still not at a comfortable price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be at $925000 is too low for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. This is my final concession, and I hope we can meet in the middle.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think $950000 is the highest I can go. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I've made significant concessions, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $960000, but I need to be honest with you, I'm starting to lose interest in continuing the negotiation. If we can't meet at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $940000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $960000, Bob. I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet at a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to be at $955000 to consider it a fair deal. If not, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've reached the limit of my budget, and I'm afraid I can't go any higher. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't meet at a price that works for both of us. I'm going to have to pass on this opportunity.
